title: Friender
description: A web app to find like-minded people near you. After making an account and building a profile, users are able to explore, match, and chat with other uses within their selected geographic search radius.
notes: To best experience demo, use demo account provided on homepage, or create a new user with zipcode set to 10001 and a radius of 10 or greater.

title: Jobly
description: A job board web app to explore jobs and employers. Try the live search feature for a quick and responsive search experience.

title: Wordle
description: I love Wordle, so I made my own version! Users can use machine keyboard or UI keyboard buttons to play. Game record is stored in local storage to track your record over time! Unlike the official Wordle, this version provides an unlimited number of words per day.
